welcome_message_body: Welcome to Misato, Japan! This charming city is known for its beautiful cherry blossoms, delicious local cuisine, and rich history. We invite you to explore and enjoy all that Misato has to offer during your visit.

restaurants.name: 麺屋にぼすけ本舗
